pullrequest.title: [Citadel] Converter: add `descendant_name` attribute to recursively search for elements to convert

content.raw:
There seems to be a problem handling nested elements. I tested with the following
```
  std::string xmlString = R"SDF(
  <sdf>
    <model name="M">
      <frame name="F1"/>
      <model name="NM">
        <frame name="L2"/>
      </model>
    </model>
  </sdf>
  )SDF";

  std::string convertString = R"SDF(
    <convert name="sdf">
      <convert descendant_name="model">
        <remove element="frame"/>
      </convert>
    </convert>
  )SDF";
```

And the output I got was
```
 <sdf>
    <model name="M">
        <model name="NM">
            <frame name="L2" />
        </model>
    </model>
</sdf>
```
but I expected all `frame` elements to be removed.
